title: Shaaz Ahmedüêº
subtitle: Panda Enthusiast. writer. friend.
writtenText:
You are art.
And art is everything.
heyThereBody:
My name is Shaaz. Doctor by profession, writer by passion.
(I also support Arsenal Football Club to maximise suffering).
I write to express myself, sometimes to share the happy feelings inside, sometimes to let go of things I carried on for too long, perhaps helping my readers relieve some of their burdens too. And if I'm able to reach out to at least one other soul? It's all worth it.
instagramTitle: I also write on instagram. Read maybe?
